sentences.sContent: They killed four policemen while robbing a bank.
sentences.sCn: 他们抢劫一家银行的时候杀了4名警察。

sentences.sContent: A 77-year-old woman was robbed at knifepoint.
sentences.sCn: 一名77岁老妪遭到持刀抢劫。

sentences.sContent: The illness robbed him of a normal childhood.
sentences.sCn: 疾病使他无法拥有一个正常的童年。

trans.tranOther: to steal money or property from a person, bank etc
